name: Criminal Bundle
description: Criminal Bundle is a first person shooter online multiplayer with low poly esthetic. Shoot other players while trying to open the safe or prevent criminals from run away with the money.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (solo versiones de 64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i3-2400s @ 2.5 GHz AMD FX-6350 @ 3.9 GHz o equivalente Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 AMD R9 270 (2048 MB VRAM con Shader Model 5.0 o superior) DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (solo versiones de 64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
